alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 12 at 1:49AM MDT until October 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches, with locally higher amounts possible on the higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
